name: main
description: Main cookbook for NewSpring Cloud Servers
long_description:
Description
===========

A very simple set of recipes that will help configure a Rackspace cloud server running 10.04. 

More to come...

Requirements
============

Attributes
==========

Usage
=====

It's best to just include recipes in roles or specified in a run list.

rightscale/public_key.description: Public Key to simplify logging in

recipes.main::apache: Disables default site and sets up ports
recipes.main::added_to_lb: Notifcation that instance was added to Load Balancer
recipes.main::removed_from_lb: Notification was removed from the Load Balancer
recipes.main::memcache_hostname_setup: Sets up a local memcache hostname to connect to the memcache instance on the deployment
recipes.main::lock_down_sudo: Lock down su and disable root access
